rows.text_1:
Whenever you can, pause, praise and reward yourself. And remember to connect with your family and friends - you are not alone.

Care for yourself every day. You matter!
rows.quiz_1_question: What can you do to take care of yourself today?
rows.quiz_1_feedback_1: Excellent. Taking care of yourself is an important parenting skill!
